Uses of Package
soen6441.kingdoms.core

Packages that use soen6441.kingdoms.core
soen6441.kingdoms.core This package holds classes represents core objects in game logic. 
soen6441.kingdoms.strategy This package holds strategy related classes 
 

Classes in soen6441.kingdoms.core used by soen6441.kingdoms.core
Board
          This class represents the board with 5 rows and 6 columns and a function to place the Placeable(tile or castle) on the Board
BoardPos
          Utility structure for board position
Castle
          Class representing a castle identified by the rank of the castle: rank1,rank2, etc and the id of the player holding it it also includes a value to a castle depending on its rank
GameState
          GameState is a container for all data structure used in the game logic
Placeable
          This interface is declared to group the set of objects that can be placed on the board such as tiles and castles into a common object called placeable
Player
          This class represents the player with its id, the value of coins that he has, its initial tile, the set of castles he gets.
Serializer
          Helper class for serialize to / de-serialize from XML for GameState
Tile
          This class defines the type of tiles example: resource,hazards etc...
TileStack
          An instance of TileStack contains the list of tiles that need to be in the tile supply area on the board.
 

Classes in soen6441.kingdoms.core used by soen6441.kingdoms.strategy
Board
          This class represents the board with 5 rows and 6 columns and a function to place the Placeable(tile or castle) on the Board
BoardPos
          Utility structure for board position
Placeable
          This interface is declared to group the set of objects that can be placed on the board such as tiles and castles into a common object called placeable
Player
          This class represents the player with its id, the value of coins that he has, its initial tile, the set of castles he gets.
Tile
          This class defines the type of tiles example: resource,hazards etc...
TileStack
          An instance of TileStack contains the list of tiles that need to be in the tile supply area on the board.
